page.title: 07A Parish Council Meeting
page.content: The present Parish Coouncil consists of Chairman -Mr D. James, a retired farmer Members -a bank manager, a local post office owner, a director of Stafford Rangers Football Club and an auctioneer The Agenda of the Parish Council Meeting on Thursday 27th June 1985 was: 1. Apologies 2. Minutes 3. Repair of telephone kiosk 4. Renovation/resiting of notice board 5. Co-option of new member of Council 6. General repairs to roads 7. Keeping Public Footpaths open 8. Application for Planning Permission 9. Spending #1000 on four street lights 10.Purchase of legal book about public footpaths and rights of way
